bibl.title: An Early Christian Complex in Hauwariya-South.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Byzantine complex probably founded for philanthropic purposes (ghrokome›on or nosokome›on). <gerokomeion, nosokomeion>
ABDAL-FATAH Ahmed and Peter GROSSMANN, An Early Christian Complex in Hauwariya-South.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 39 (2000) pp. 23-41, 6 figg. et pll. I-II.
